task.title: Starting the Engine with an Electric Starter
task.shortdesc: Procedure for starting an engine using the electric starter on modern automobiles.

prereq.p: Ensure the vehicle is in a safe, well-ventilated area with the parking brake engaged.

step.stepxmp: Set levers to the same position as for manual cranking

step.info: Preferably use the magneto for ignition

step.cmd: Locate the starter push button on the floor
Prime the carburetor if the engine is cold

substep.cmd: Pull out the carburetor priming rod on the instrument board
substep.stepxmp: Hold the rod out for only a few seconds to avoid flooding the engine

step.cmd: Press the starter push button with your foot
step.stepxmp: This engages the shaft with the flywheel teeth

result.p: The engine should now be running. Allow it to warm up before driving.
